name: Sochi Nights
description:
Sochi Nights is a game for ZX Spectrum (and its emulators). Taking setting in a russian environment, it delivers the story about the protagonist, who found a strange electronics artifact.

Sochi Nights was developed for the Yandex Retro Games Battle' 2019 contest. It can be ran on any modern emulator(e.g. Fuse).

The developers of Sochi Nights:

  • Fedor Zagumennov (Sgw32) - coding, graphics, production
  • Pavel Kolyshev (nightpavell) - graphics(screens, sprites)
  • Vladimir Tugay (Darkman007) - game music
